Rhinox/Sniper


Rhinox, already outside fires his 2 chain guns at Koga Shuko. Around 
150 bullets I think.

Sniper hears the fighting outside. He runs to a window and sees 'the 
newcomers' He fires 2 bullets form his rifle at Sets head.
